api¶

class domos.util.db.ActionArgs(*args, **kwargs)¶

Arguments to send with an action RPC Action: Action to which the arguments belong RPCArgs: The argument Value: Value of this argument

class domos.util.db.Actions(*args, **kwargs)¶

Actions to send to a module Module: The module to send the action to Ident: Identifier for this action

class domos.util.db.ActionsForTrigger(*args, **kwargs)¶

Triggers to trigger an action

  • Action: The action to trigger
  • Trigger: which trigger triggers this action
  • Match: Expression, the action is only executed

if triggered and if the expression resolves to a non-False value

class domos.util.db.BaseModel(*args, **kwargs)¶

Base model of the database, provides default settings

class domos.util.db.Macros(*args, **kwargs)¶

Macro table, nothing more that key-value pairs

class domos.util.db.Match(*args, **kwargs)¶

Table that contains expressions used by other tables

  • Matchsting: String containing the expression
  • Pickled: binary blob containing the pickled AST of the expression
class domos.util.db.Module(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model of a module

  • Name: Name of the module
  • queue: message queue the module is listening on
  • Active: whether the module is active or not
class domos.util.db.ModuleRPC(*args, **kwargs)¶

RPC a module supports.

  • Module: foreign key to a module
  • RPCType: foreign, the type of rpc
  • key: Key to distiguish multiple rpc’s of the same type
class domos.util.db.RPCArgs(*args, **kwargs)¶

Arguments for a RPC

  • ModuleRPC: foreign key to a RPC
  • name: Name of the argument, used in the dictionary send to the module
  • RPCargtype: Type of argument, eg: string, integer
  • Optional: Whether the argument is optional
class domos.util.db.RPCTypes(*args, **kwargs)¶

Available types of RPC calls see also the rpctypes variable

class domos.util.db.SensorArgs(*args, **kwargs)¶

Argument of a sensor, combination of a RPCArg and a sensor

  • Sensor: The sensor for which the argument is
  • RPCArg: The argument
  • Value: The value of this argument
class domos.util.db.SensorFunctions(*args, **kwargs)¶

Mapping of Sensors used by expressions

  • Sensor: which sensor to which...
  • Match: Match using this sensor
  • Function: Which function to use on the values of this sensor
  • Args: Tuple of arguments for the sensor function
class domos.util.db.SensorValues(*args, **kwargs)¶

Values of a sensor, represents a measurement value of the sensor at a certain point in time

  • Sensor: associated sensor
  • Value: measurement value
  • Timestamp: Point in time of the value
class domos.util.db.Sensors(*args, **kwargs)¶

Sensor

  • Module: Module associated with the sensor
  • Ident: identifier of the sensor
  • Active: Whether the sensor is active or disabled
  • Instant: is the sensor of the type Instant
class domos.util.db.TriggerFunctions(*args, **kwargs)¶

Mapping of triggers used by expressions

  • Trigger: which trigger to which...
  • Match: Match using this sensor
  • Function: Which function to use on the values of this sensor
  • Args: Tuple of arguments for the sensor function
class domos.util.db.TriggerValues(*args, **kwargs)¶

Values of triggers

  • Trigger: Trigger to which this value belongs
  • Value: The actual value
  • Timestamp: Time at which this value was calculated
class domos.util.db.Triggers(*args, **kwargs)¶

Table with triggers * Name: Name of the trigger * Match: foreign, match on which the trigger activates * Record: Whether to log this trigger to the triggervalues table * Lastvalue: Last calculated value of this trigger

class domos.util.db.dbhandler(conf=None, database=None)¶

Database handler class

addModule(name, queue, active=True)¶

Add a module to the database.

Parameters:
  • name – Name of the module
  • queue – queue to use at the message broker
  • active – Initialize the module as activated or not
Return type:

The created module
addRPC(module, key, rpctype, args, descr=None)¶

Adds an rpc command to the database

Parameters:
  • module – module object
  • key – name of the rpc
  • rpctype – string of the type of the rpc
  • args – list of tuples, (name, type, optional, descr)
  • descr – description of the rpc request
addSensor(module, identifier, argdata)¶

Add a sensor to the database argdata: list of dicts with name=value pairs

addTrigger(name, trigger, sensorlist, descr=None)¶

trigger string examples: “__trig0__ == True”

checkSensorTriggers(sensor)¶
close()¶

Close the connection to the database

connect()¶

Open a connection to the database

create_tables()¶

Try to create a set of empty tables, silently fails if the table already exists

getActionsfromtrigger(trigger_id)¶
getModules()¶

returns an iterator with Module objects

Return type:An one use iterator with Module objects
getRPCCall(module, type)¶
getdict(kwarg, key, value)¶
init_tables()¶

Initialize any preconfigured content that is needed for initial start up. Currently only the RPCTypes table is filled and needed; All modules are configured as inactive

listModules()¶

returns a list with Module objects

Return type:A list with Module
domos.util.db.rpctypes = ['list', 'get', 'del', 'add', 'set']¶

Peewee database models
